content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x1)

### Coal mine at position(y)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position y1)

### Iron plate factory at position(z)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position z1)
- Inserter (position a) that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position b) that connects the furnace at position x1 to the assembling machine at position z1

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items due to insufficient resources
- Ensure you have the required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, to craft Iron Gear Wheel, you need iron-plate.

### Errors when extracting from entities
- Make sure to check the inventory of the entity you are extracting from to ensure it contains the items you need.

### Errors when placing items into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. Check for any existing entities that may block placement.

### Errors when using crafting machines
- Ensure that the crafting machine or furnace you are using is properly set up and has the necessary items to craft the desired product.
